instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1370: What is A1370? A1370 is a model number for a 11 inch size MacBook Air from years Late 2010, Mid 2011 with EMC 2393, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2796, 820-3024..

threads.title: Service Battery
threads.message:
Very quick question, not seen this before, searched the net and after doing the SMC reset, same problem exists just need some advice before I make a report to the company that potentially is buying it in.
MBA <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1370</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid 2011. Battery indicator and in system info show 40 cycle count and service battery. Opened the MBA up and it has a new battery fitted. So assuming the battery is not good, is there anything else I need to be checking.
TIA
Marc

threads.title: Service Battery
threads.message:
Try known good battery, even old one.
Never trust the crappy new chinese batteries.

threads.title: Service Battery
threads.message: New battery.... use an A1495 to replace
